value:
$WmMPID_冬祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_Winter20,Face|Hmph... Why do I have to get involved
with the festival?!$k$pThere are so many strangers!
It's terrifying!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Winter20,Face|Yeah... That's right! Why do I have to
lug all these heavy presents around?$k$pShouldn't it be someone strong?
Or someone with the endurance
of a racehorse? Why US? Ugh!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭フェリクス,ch17_14_Felix_M_Winter20,Face|You can't fool me with your little
defenseless-child act.$k$pI'm not exactly pleased either, but...
I cannot defy the summoner's orders.$k$pSince there's no use complaining,
the best strategy is to hurry up and
be done with it.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Winter20,Face|Mrgh... I guess we have no choice.
C'mon, Bernie. Time to stop hiding.
Don't make me drag you along...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_Winter20,Face|Waahhh! Oh no! Somebody, help me!$k$p

$WmMPID_冬祭ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Winter20,Face|Aaand here you go. This is a present
from me to you. Treasure it for the
rest of your life, OK?$k$pHey, Bernadetta, there's one
over there, just waiting for you.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_Winter20,Face|R-r-right! Here. It's a gift!
Er, for the festival.$k$pN-no need to thank me!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭フェリクス,ch17_14_Felix_M_Winter20,Face|Here, take this.$k$p...What? No! I don't want any gifts
from you in return. Hey! I have no
need for sweets! Come back here!$k$pCurses...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Winter20,Face|Whew! I'm exhausted... We're done
now, aren't we?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_Winter20,Face|I-it's over... I'm no longer burdened
by any higher obligation!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭フェリクス,ch17_14_Felix_M_Winter20,Face|Hey, you two, take this. Split it.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Winter20,Face|Hm? Sweets? Sweets! Yes!$k$pHey, Bernie, we've got sweets!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_Winter20,Face|Oh, and they're so cute too...
Not too cute to eat though!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Winter20,Face|Even if it was rather onerous, it was
not entirely void of fun, was it?$k$pGiving to others rarely ever feels
bad, I suppose...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_Winter20,Face|Y-you're right, though! I've never
had so many people thank me
before in my life...$k$pIt would've been better if I didn't
have to give them the presents
face-to-face, though...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Winter20,Face|I agree. It'd be great if there were
some kind of magic that could send
a gift wherever you wanted...$k$pI guess we're already done, so there's
no sense wishing it went differently.
So forget it! Time for tea and sweets!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_Winter20,Face|Good idea! I'll go curl up in my room
and enjoy a nice pot of hot tea...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Winter20,Face|Hey now! Tea is best enjoyed
with others!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_Winter20,Face|Gah! Let go of me! Y-you can't
just scruff the back of my neck,
Hilda! I-I'm not a cat!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Winter20,Face|You're coming too, Felix. I know you
wouldn't be seen eating sweets, but
you'll have some tea with us, right?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭フェリクス,ch17_14_Felix_M_Winter20,Face|No, no. I think I'm... Achoo!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Winter20,Face|See? You need to get warmed up!
Being stubborn won't help.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭フェリクス,ch17_14_Felix_M_Winter20,Face|Guh... Fine. One cup.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_Winter20,Face|Wait, Felix is coming too?! Oh no...
No, I can't! It's too many people!
Oh no-no-no-no...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭フェリクス,ch17_14_Felix_M_Winter20,Face|...Did you say something, Bernie?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_Winter20,Face|N-no! Of course not...$k$p
